layout.singingstanza: Join all the glo -- rious names Of wis -- dom, love, and pow'r, That mor -- tals ev -- er knew, That an -- gels ev -- er bore; All are too mean to speak His worth, Too mean to set my Sav -- ior forth.

lyrics.stanza: Join all the glorious names Of wisdom, love, and pow'r, That mortals ever knew, That angels ever bore; All are too mean to speak His worth, Too mean to set my Savior forth.
Jesus, my great High Priest, Offered His blood, and died; My guilty conscience seeks No sacrifice beside: His pow'rful blood did me redeem, 'Tis worthy of my heart's esteem.
I love my Shepherd's voice: His watchful eye shall keep My wand'ring soul among The thousands of His sheep: He feeds His flock, He calls their names, His bosom bears the tender lambs.
My Savior and my Lord, My Conqu'ror and my King, Thy scepter and Thy sword, Thy reigning grace I sing: Thine is the pow'r; behold I sit In willing bonds beneath Thy feet.
